name: Add An Attribute
function_list: add_attributes(image_id: str, classname: str, attributes: list) -> dict
description: Adds specified attributes to a given class (concept) in the image.
example_questions: Can you add [attribute name] to [object name] class?
Can you add [attribute name] to [object name] concept?

tools: add_attributes(image_id: str, classname: str, attributes: list) -> dict
